abstract: Officials from Administration for Children's Services visit Holy Child Jesus Church in Queens to thank parishioners for their offers to adopt newborn abandoned at church by his mother; visit is part of campaign by organization to harness outpouring of support for child and publicize fact that there are thousands of children in foster care who are in need of adoptive homes.
lead_paragraph: Officials from the New York City Administration for Children’s Services are seeking to draw attention to the thousands of other children in foster care who are waiting for adoptive homes.

headline.main: Abandoned Baby Found at Queens Church Inspires Adoption Campaign
headline.print_headline: Abandoned Baby Found at Queens Church Inspires Adoption Campaign

snippet: Officials from the New York City Administration for Children’s Services are seeking to draw attention to the thousands of other children in foster care who are waiting for adoptive homes.

keywords.value: Church of the Holy Child Jesus (Queens, NY)
